attributes.action: Stop the veterinary groups charging extortionate fees.
attributes.additional_details: The fees that are charged for looking after unwell animals are ridiculously expensive. There are family pets suffering as pet owners are worried they can’t afford to take their pets to be seen by a vet. The mark up price of medication is unbelievably high. It’s greed and the practice groups are only looking at profit.
attributes.background: I want the government to look at what these groups are charging for consultation, medication and general procedures.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual vets.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Create a free Animal Health Service for pets please: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/581142

Reduce VAT on veterinary services from 20% to 5%: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590352
